flawed_nl_solution:
There were 30 + 20 = <<30+20=50>>50 attendees at the party.
A total of 50 x 2/5 = <<50*2/5=250/2>>250/2 people left the party.
Nine of those who left were men while 250/2 - 9 = <<250/2-9=116>>116 of them were women.
So, 30 - 116= <<30-116=-86>>-86 women stayed at the party.
And 20 - 9 = <<20-9=11>>11 men stayed at the party.
Thus, -86 - 11 = <<-86-11=-97>>-97 more women than men stayed at the party.
#### -97

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 250/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
